channel.title: blogs on MeltedMagic
channel.description: Recent content in blogs on MeltedMagic

item.title: Math, Physics, and Blogs
item.description: Note: This page will continually be updated. Math and Physics Resources Elijan J. Mastnak - Physics and Math notes along with a guide to setup $\LaTeX$ and neovim. Dexter Chua - Somehow this guy took a lot of classes at Cambridge and managed to write lecture notes for all of the classes. Gilles Castel - This man optimised $\LaTeX$ beyond anything I thought imaginable. Christopher Pope - Physicist at Texas A&M University.
